#fcsinfo

= FCSInfo =

_fcsinfo_ is straightforward to use:

*>* fcsinfo _file_

For instance:

*>* fcsinfo sample1.fcs2

{{{Name:        result.fcs
Events:      35253
Mode:        L
Datatype:    I

Column Information

     Range: 1024
SSC-H

     Range: 1024
FL1-H

     Range: 1024
FL3-H
   BitSize: 32
     Range: 1024

...          ...          ...          ...          ...

296          206          550          708          227}}}
